paper_keywords: Topological degree theory in set-valued analysis
paper_abstract: In this paper, we investigate the periodic dynamical behaviors for a class of general Cohen-Grossberg BAM neural networks with discontinuous right-hand sides, time-varying and distributed delays. By means of differential inclusions theory and the topological degree theory in set-valued analysis, the existence of periodic solution for the neural networks is obtained. Moreover, our results extend previous works not only on time-varying and distributed delayed neural networks with continuous or even Lipschitz continuous activations, but also on time-varying and distributed delayed neural networks with discontinuous activations. Finally, we give some numerical examples to show the applicability and effectiveness of our main results. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the periodic dynamics of a general Cohen-Grossberg BAM neural networks via differential inclusions
